sense.def: Abbreviated Designation ke 咳 ; sou 嗽 . Alternative Names ke ni 咳逆 , a cough with counterflow [of qi]; sou ni 嗽逆. ① IS. A reflex reaction of the respiratory apparatus provoked by some stimulus. Jin gui yao lue 金匱要略 Mj: 留飲者，脅下痛引缺盆，咳嗽則輒已 , “In the case of abiding rheum, there is pain below the flanks that pulls on the ‘broken bowl’; when [patients] cough this will end soon”.
② Pathological Condition of cough. Su wen 素問 5: 秋傷於濕，冬生 咳嗽 ,“If he is harmed by moisture in autumn, he will develop a cough in winter”.
